mapper.select: select * from inventory_remain order by idx
select * from inventory_remain where name = #{ name }
select * from inventory_remain where idx=#{ idx }
mapper.insert: insert into inventory_remain values (null, #{ name }, #{ cnt }, now())
mapper.update: update inventory_remain set cnt = #{ cnt }, regdate=now() where idx = #{ idx }
mapper.delete: delete from inventory_remain where idx= #{ idx }
